after_control_variables.comment: After control variables, to not highlight as a struct/interface (before formatting with gofmt)

field_hover.comment: struct field property and types when hovering with the mouse

patterns.comment: single function as a type returned type(s) declaration
multiple params and types | multiple params one type | one param one type

functions_inline.comment: functions in-line with multi return types

patterns.comment: multiple params and types | multiple types one param

operators.comment: Note that the order here is very important!

other_struct_interface_expressions.comment: struct and interface expression in-line (before curly bracket)

patterns.comment: after control variables must be added exactly here, do not move it! (changing may not affect tests, so be careful!)

slice_index_variables.comment: slice index and capacity variables, to not scope them as property variables

struct_interface_declaration.comment: struct, interface type declarations (related to: struct_variables_types, interface_variables_types)

struct_variable_types_fields_multi.comment: struct variable and type fields with multi lines

patterns.comment: one type only with multi line raw string
one line - property variables and types
one line with semicolon(;) without formatting gofmt - single type | property variables and types

switch_select_case_variables.comment: variables after case control keyword in switch/select expression, to not scope them as property variables

switch_types.comment: switch type assertions, only highlights types after case keyword

patterns.comment: types after case keyword with single line
types after case keyword with multi lines

type-declarations-without-brackets.comment: includes all type declarations without brackets (in some cases, brackets need to be captured manually)

type_assertion_inline.comment: struct/interface types in-line (type assertion) | switch type keyword

var_const_assignment.comment: variable assignment with var and const keyword

patterns.comment: var and const with single type assignment
var and const with multi type assignment

media-feature-keywords.match:
(?xi)
(?<=^|\s|:|\*/)
(?: portrait
| landscape
| progressive
| interlace
| fullscreen
| standalone
| minimal-ui
| browser
| hover
)
(?=\s|\)|$)
media-feature-keywords.name: support.constant.property-value.css

(?xi)
(?<=^|\s|\(|\*/)
(?:

(
(?:min-|max-)?
(?: height
| width
| aspect-ratio
| color
| color-index
| monochrome
| resolution
)
| grid
| scan
| orientation
| display-mode
| hover
)
|

(
(?:min-|max-)?
device-

| aspect-ratio
)
)
|

(
(?:

[-_]

hp|tc|wap|ro
)
|

(?: mso

)
)
-
[\w-]+
(?=
\s*
(?:
/\*
(?:[^*]|\*[^/])*
\*/
)?
\s*
[:)]
)
)
)
(?=\s|$|[><:=]|\)|/\*)

patterns.match:
(?xi) (?<![\w-])
[-+]?

(?:
[0-9]+ (?:\.[0-9]+)?
| \.[0-9]+
)

(?:
(?<=[0-9])
E
[-+]?
[0-9]+
)?

(?:
(%)

\b

patterns.name: constant.numeric.css

pseudo-elements.match:
(?xi)
(?:
(::?)
(?: after
| before
| first-letter
| first-line
| (?:-(?:ah|apple|atsc|epub|hp|khtml|moz
|ms|o|rim|ro|tc|wap|webkit|xv)
| (?:mso|prince))
-[a-z-]+
)
|
(::)
(?: backdrop
| content
| grammar-error
| marker
| placeholder
| selection
| shadow
| spelling-error
)
)
(?![\w-]|\s*[;}])
pseudo-elements.name: entity.other.attribute-name.pseudo-element.css

patterns.match:
(?x)
# Qualified namespace prefix
( -?(?!\d)(?:[\w-]|[^\x00-\x7F]|\\(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,6}|.))+
| \*
)
# Lookahead to ensure there's a valid identifier ahead
(?=
\| (?!\s|=|$|\])
(?: -?(?!\d)
|   [\\\w-]
|   [^\x00-\x7F]
)
)
